snippet.title: DELUGE by riggy2k3 - Official Trailer (OUT NOW ON STEAM!!!!)
snippet.description:
DELUGE is the story of a village under siege. As the town of Figaro begins a dangerous tradition, an evil entity arrives to mark their own momentous occasion. When one of their minions goes rogue, he finds himself the key to Figaro's survival. 

Will you protect the people of Figaro, or join in on the chaos? 💀

DELUGE on Steam: http://www.delugegame.com
DELUGE on Itch.io: https://riggy2k3.itch.io/deluge
DELUGE on rpgmaker.net: https://rpgmaker.net/games/12132/
DELUGE Merch: http://merch.delugegame.com
